answers.answer: Hello,there are medications such as viagra that could help, but your friend should discuss this with his doctor.The most important way for your friend to maximuse his performance as well as his health is to control his diabetes very well.This means making sure his blood sugars are as close to nromal as possible (fasting ideally should be < 100 and 2 hours after eating meals should be < 140, but ideally less than 120, or even 100, if he can acheive this safely.To do this he should exercise moderate to vigorous at least 30 mins a day, eat diet high in non-starchy veges and natural foods and avoid processed and sweet foods.his dr can help optimise his medications, if he is taking any.  Hope thisw helps.
